description:
Designed for mountain routes and glacier travel. The Glacier Axe has a nice balanced weight, smooth finishing, and forms a solid anchor on sun-baked, hardened snow and bare ice. The head is designed to rest comfortably in your hand, and it comes with a comfortable Linkin leash.

  • Aluminum shaft has a hard- anodized finish for excellent rust protection
  • 3mm pick is hot-forged chromoly steel, offers good bite in hard snow and ice
  • Teeth offer purchase when used for hooking and anchoring
  • Steel adze supports your hand comfortably and is edged to chop steps efficiently
  • Stainless steel spike with a clippable hole
  • Linkin leash included
name: Petzl Glacier Ice Axe
